mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.apply_no AS "applyNo", a.property_right AS "propertyRight", a.property_name AS "propertyName", a.current_use_status AS "currentUseStatus", a.house_use_property AS "houseUseProperty", a.land_use_property AS "landUseProperty", a.house_type AS "houseType", a.cont_province AS "contProvince", a.cont_city AS "contCity", a.cont_distinct AS "contDistinct", a.cont_details AS "contDetails", a.building_area AS "buildingArea", a.using_area AS "usingArea", a.floor_num AS "floorNum", a.house_years AS "houseYears", a.service_life AS "serviceLife", a.house_purchase_price AS "housePurchasePrice", a.is_keep_papers AS "isKeepPapers", a.is_property_line AS "isPropertyLine", a.is_shift_record AS "isShiftRecord", a.property_status AS "propertyStatus", a.is_unique_house AS "isUniqueHouse", a.evaluate_way AS "evaluateWay", a.market_price AS "marketPrice", a.evaluate_price AS "evaluatePrice", a.mortgagee_id AS "mortgageeId", a.mortgagee_name AS "mortgageeName", a.mortgagee_id_num AS "mortgageeIdNum", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.house_card_number AS "houseCardNumber", a.land_card_number AS "landCardNumber", a.land_property AS "landProperty", a.mortgage_rate AS "mortgageRate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.mortgage_note AS "mortgageNote", a.SV_FLAG AS svFlag
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM cre_mortgage_house_info a
a.del_flag = '0'
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC

SELECT
FROM cre_mortgage_house_info a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cre_mortgage_house_info( id, apply_no, property_right, property_name, current_use_status, house_use_property, land_use_property, house_type, cont_province, cont_city, cont_distinct, cont_details, building_area, using_area, floor_num, house_years, service_life, house_purchase_price, is_keep_papers, is_property_line, is_shift_record, property_status, is_unique_house, evaluate_way, market_price, evaluate_price, mortgagee_id, mortgagee_name, mortgagee_id_num, del_flag, mortgage_rate, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, house_card_number, land_card_number, land_property, mortgage_note, sv_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{applyNo}, #{propertyRight}, #{propertyName}, #{currentUseStatus}, #{houseUseProperty}, #{landUseProperty}, #{houseType}, #{contProvince}, #{contCity}, #{contDistinct}, #{contDetails}, #{buildingArea}, #{usingArea}, #{floorNum}, #{houseYears}, #{serviceLife}, #{housePurchasePrice}, #{isKeepPapers}, #{isPropertyLine}, #{isShiftRecord}, #{propertyStatus}, #{isUniqueHouse}, #{evaluateWay}, #{marketPrice}, #{evaluatePrice}, #{mortgageeId}, #{mortgageeName}, #{mortgageeIdNum}, '0', #{mortgageRate}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{houseCardNumber}, #{landCardNumber}, #{landProperty}, #{mortgageNote}, #{svFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cre_mortgage_house_info SET apply_no = #{applyNo}, property_right = #{propertyRight}, property_name = #{propertyName}, current_use_status = #{currentUseStatus}, house_use_property = #{houseUseProperty}, land_use_property = #{landUseProperty}, house_type = #{houseType}, house_card_number = #{houseCardNumber}, land_card_number = #{landCardNumber}, land_property = #{landProperty}, cont_province = #{contProvince}, cont_city = #{contCity}, cont_distinct = #{contDistinct}, cont_details = #{contDetails}, building_area = #{buildingArea}, using_area = #{usingArea}, floor_num = #{floorNum}, house_years = #{houseYears}, service_life = #{serviceLife}, house_purchase_price = #{housePurchasePrice}, is_keep_papers = #{isKeepPapers}, is_property_line = #{isPropertyLine}, is_shift_record = #{isShiftRecord}, property_status = #{propertyStatus}, is_unique_house = #{isUniqueHouse}, evaluate_way = #{evaluateWay}, market_price = #{marketPrice}, evaluate_price = #{evaluatePrice}, mortgagee_id = #{mortgageeId}, mortgagee_name = #{mortgageeName}, mortgagee_id_num = #{mortgageeIdNum}, mortgage_rate = #{mortgageRate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, mortgage_note = #{mortgageNote}, sv_flag = #{svFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(1) from cre_mortgage_house_info c where c.APPLY_NO = #{applyNo} and c.DEL_FLAG = '0'

SELECT
FROM cre_mortgage_house_info a
and a.apply_no = #{applyNo} and a.DEL_FLAG = '0'

SELECT
FROM cre_mortgage_house_info a
and a.apply_no = #{applyNo} and a.DEL_FLAG = '0'
